Text: This release is a day old, yet no comments?
Good rip. DVD quality. Hardcoded chinese subs, get used to them over time.

Very watchable in my opinion. Once you get past the Chinese subs..

Thanks.

So not to be ungrateful or anything, but is there a version of this ANYWHERE that doesnt have hardcoded subs? I really hate seeing that on my screen, and it distracts significantly. Other than the subs this is a wonderful download, and good quality. Worth the DL if you dont mind the subs. Other torrents on TPB all seem to have the subs as well, god only knows why.
